channel.title: A community site idea
channel.description:
[size=15pt]WhatFails.org[/size]
How does it sound, a site that will tell you what fails and what doesn't!
[size=15pt]How Will It Work?[/size]
Well, every user is allowed to make [b]<insert number here>[/b] directories that contain an index page. That page will have a sort of poll in it, and if the poll says it fails then the banner is something like "X Fails!" and then explain what X is and a link to wikipedia etc on info on the thing.
[size=15pt]Problems![/size]
My only problem is that... i dont know php :| We have a lot of great coders here and i thought maybe they'd want to have a part in it. I can do the graphics with help of anyone else that wants to. Then all we need is the HTML which i [i]could[/i] put together, but it may not be great... ________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Well, i guess if you like the idea just post your name and i will add you to the list.
Oh and please dont let this idea just die like every other.
People working on site:
[ul][li]magma[/li] [li]Me[/li][/ul]
People helping with hosting:
[ul][li]Greeny[/li][/ul]
Banner: [img]http://img150.imageshack.us/img150/2668/bannerdz2.png[/img]

item.title: A community site idea
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:22, topic:204264”][quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=269751.msg2220305#msg2220305 date=1210495171]

Billy, your great at photoshop, why dont you have a go at a banner (that is if you want to).

Billy isn’t ‘great’ at PhotoShop, he just stumbles around randomly pressing buttons and moving the paint brush in non predestined motions.
[/quote]

So tell me what do you do? Do you plan every step before you do the entire piece? Sit there for a few hours writing down exactly what you do before you do it?

Also I do not stumble around. I try different things. I place things where I think they are best. Now explain to me how you differ from me in photoshop.[/quote]

I could tell you many ways I differ from you in using Photoshop. But I don’t want to insult you anymore than I already have.

Read full topic

Billy, your great at photoshop, why dont you have a go at a banner (that is if you want to).
[/quote]

Billy isn’t ‘great’ at PhotoShop, he just stumbles around randomly pressing buttons and moving the paint brush in non predestined motions.[/quote]

So tell me what do you do? Do you plan every step before you do the entire piece? Sit there for a few hours writing down exactly what you do before you do it?

Also I do not stumble around. I try different things. I place things where I think they are best. Now explain to me how you differ from me in photoshop.

Read full topic

item.title: A community site idea
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

Trying not to sound like im showing off but im good at graphics, when i have a set image to make and some time to do it. Im going to re-do the banner later.

[quote=“magma828, post:1, topic:204574”]There is no attached file? Anyway, I thought you were planning on making your own template, or getting someone from here (like me :P) to do it.

I also thought the banner looked okay, and the site would need to be grey-ish.[/quote]
The attached file is to the main post but yeh its just an idea, if you could put one together that would be great.

Read full topic

item.title: A community site idea
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

[quote=“k00dr, post:3, topic:204264”]What would this achieve though?
To me it seems like it would be just “for lulz”…

What would you use it for? What’s the first thing you’d post on there?[/quote]
Well, mainly for the lulz but like Urban Dictionary, it provides imformative lulz. And plus that will allow us to argue about if PS3 fails or not etc

[quote=“Kimber, post:2, topic:204264”]I dont really understand[/quote]Sorry i’ll explain a bit better. For example every user is allowed to make a few pages about different items or things eg. Moparscape if they do not exist. Then anyone viewing that page can vote in a poll about if it fails or not. And eventually if it gets more people on it we can put google ads and other advertisement

Read full topic
